Headline: #34 South Michigan Temporary Reroute near 130th/Eberhart
ShortDescription: 34 South Michigan buses temp. rerouted via: SB; 130th, Indiana, 134th, St. Lawrence, 131st; NB; Eberhart, Vernon, 134th, Indiana and 130th, near 130th/Eberhart.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#34 South Michigan buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions due to street blockage, near 130th/Eberhart.

Southbound buses will operate via: 130th, Indiana, 134th, St. Lawrence, and 131st.

Northbound buses will operate via: Eberhart, Vernon, 134th, Indiana and 130th.

Allow extra travel time.
